MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-DEC-2020 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the ML11 postcode area of Carnwarth. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.30pm this evening following reports of a damaged underground cable located in Blin Wel Way and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.29pm on Wednesday 16th December 2020.
